description:
With a bit of a cat eye wink, these sunnies add a vintage aesthetic to a classic silhouette. In a world awash with Wayfarer clones, the Laval adds a little style and a little tech to rise above.

  • Fits small to medium faces best
  • Polarized lenses cut through glare and reflections, great for use around water, snow, pavement and anywhere else glare lies in wait
  • Anti-slip nose pads and temple tips help keep the glasses in place
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • 6-base lens curve provides great coverage without restricting air flow
name: Ryders Eyewear Laval Polarized Sunglasses
